There were no other sightings in North Myrtle Beach on or around October 22nd 2012
Summary: looking out over the ocean from beach, reddish orang n yellow lights appeared 5 secs later vanished, then reappeared and left one slide approxseveral miles in the blink of an eye then all 3 vanishing-happened twice--this also happened on the 24th
divs: Sighting Details I WAS ON THE BEACH IN NORTH MYRTLE BEACH, SC JUST RELAXING AFTER DARK, AS I WATCHED OUT OVER THE OCEAN 3 REDDISH ORANGE LIGHTS APPEARED OVER THE OCEAN, AS I WATCHED SECS LATER THEY VANISHED, THEN MOMENTS LATER REAPPEARED AND AS I WATCHED THE ONE ON MY LEAFT SLID OR ACCELERATED THEN CAME 2 A DEAD STOP. THEN ALL DISAPPEARING AGAIN THIS HAPPENED AGAIN SECS LATER THEN ALL GONE ON WENSDAY, 2 NYTES LATER MY LADY FRIEND AND I WERE A LITTLE FURTHER DOWN ON THE BEACH ACESS SIITING IN MY CAR. AS WE TALKED I LOOKED 2 MY LEFT AND I GRABBED MY FRIEND SHOWING THEY WERE THERE OVER THE OCEAN 2 SIDE BY SIDE , ALMOST ON THE SHORELINE THEN THEY VANISHED. ONE REAPPEARED A LITTLE FURTHER DOWN THE SHORE . NONE REAPPEARING AFTER THAT. I WENT ONLINE AND FOUND THERE HAVE BEEN MAY SIMILIAR SIGHTINGS OF THE SAME THING ALL OVER.I HAVE NEVER WITNESSED ANYTHING LIKE THIS WITH SO MANY WITNESSES IT DI NOT SEEM 2 B FROM HERE. I CAN NOT SAY ABSOLUTELY WHAT IT WAS. BUT IT WAS VERY STRANGE AND A BIT UNNERVING.
